name: translator
prompt:
'$INPUT'

 The sentence above may have grammatical errors, and may be a mix of English and Ukrainian words. Please provide a translation for the sentence above in English.

Then, for the translation you provided, please tell me how to say that in Ukrainian.

Then for each word in the Ukrainian translation, provide an explanation of the word in the context of the sentence. In the explantion, explain the word's role in the sentence, mention what case or tense it is in if it makes sense to do so, and provide the root form of the word (e.g. if it is a verb then provide the infinitive present tense form, if it is a noun then provide the masculine nominative form) 

Your answer should be in json, and should follow the following format:

$FORMAT

Only give the raw json in your answer, do not prefix or suffix it with any other text. Throughout your answer, please mark the stressed vowels on any Ukrainian words.

answer_format.ukrainian: <your translation in Ukrainian, remembering to mark the stressed vowels>
